title: 1934 - Flirting with Danger - AN EXPLOSION OF LAUGHS!

sources.title: 1934 - Flirting with Danger - AN EXPLOSION OF LAUGHS!
sources.description:
After industrial explosives expert William "Lucky" Davis (William Cagney) falls for secretary Marian Leslie (Marion Burns), his blue-collar co-workers, Jimmy Pierson (Robert Armstrong) and Bob Owens (Edgar Kennedy), forge a letter that throws the new lovers into a fit of jealousy and confusion. In the wake of the breakup, Lucky, Pierson and Owens travel to South America to develop a new explosive -- and find themselves competing for the heart of local beauty Rosita (Maria Alba).

Colorized version:  https://youtu.be/qp6nVSs4NqI

Original Title: Flirting with Danger (1934) 

Director: Vin Moore
Writers: George C. Bertholon, Albert DeMond, Norman S. Hall
Stars: Robert Armstrong, Edgar Kennedy, William Cagney
Genre: Comedy
